entry.title: Jackie O Midi Dress
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type: Dresses
Price: 390.00

The Jackie O Midi Dress is crafted from a textured sequin boucle knit, this dress blends refined structure with a soft touch. The draped neckline and tab sleeves add a sculptural finish to the tailored bodice, while the genuine leather belt defines the waist. A center back slit allows for ease of movement, perfectly complementing the sleek midi silhouette. Designed to fit close to the body, this piece is both polished and versatile.

  • Sequin Boucle Knit
  • Draped Neckline
  • Tab Sleeves
  • Tailored Bodice
  • Includes Genuine Leather Belt
  • Center Back Skirt Slit
  • Midi Length Dress
  • Falls 48" from the Shoulder
  • Hidden Center Back Zipper
  • Fully Lined
  • 4613060
  • Model Measurements: Height 5' 10", Waist 24", Bust 32 A", Hips 35"
  • Model is wearing Size 0

entry.title: 3/4 Slv Jackie O Midi
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type: Dresses
Price: 415.00

Flattering and effortlessly chic, this pencil midi dress features an asymmetrical draped neckline and fitted silhouette. The three-quarter length sleeves with cuff detail add a polished touch, while a genuine leather belt with a gold buckle cinches the waist. Made from stretch knit tweed fabric for a structured yet comfortable fit, finished with a hidden back zipper for a seamless look.

  • Asymmetrical draped neckline
  • Three-quarter length sleeves with cuffs
  • Genuine leather belt with gold buckle
  • Pencil midi silhouette
  • Stretch tweed fabric
  • Hidden back zipper
  • Model Measurements: Height 5'9½', Waist 24, Bust 32, Hips 34
  • Model is wearing size 0
  • 4043061

entry.title: Jacqueline Midi dress
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type:
Price: 390.00

A modern take on a timeless silhouette, the Jacqueline midi dress is the reimagined evolution of our iconic Jackie O. Designed for 2025, this style blends refined tailoring with sculptural draping, creating a sleek, confident look. Crafted from structured stretch super loft woven, it features an off-shoulder neckline with soft tucks that frame the bodice, leading into a streamlined pencil skirt. The fitted design flatters the natural shape, making it a go-to choice for elevated occasions.

  • Off-the-shoulder draped neckline
  • Tucked bodice detailing
  • Fitted pencil skirt
  • Midi length
  • Concealed back zipper 
  • Super Loft Woven fabric
  • 3593062

entry.title: Classic 3/4 Sleeve Jackie O Sheath Dress
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type: Dress
Price: 390.00

Laurel Berman's iconic Black Halo Classic Jackie O Dress with 3/4 sleeves is perfect for the office or an evening out. With a classically slim silhouette, this piece is made for being seen. Featuring an asymmetrical neckline, 3/4 sleeves, slim waist with built in loops the a genuine leather belt (included!), scoop back with zip closure, and knee length skirt with a back slit. The Jackie O is designed and manufactured in Los Angeles, CA, USA of imported fabrics.

entry.title: Classic Jackie O Skirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type: Skirt
Price: 298.00

The classic pencil skirt made of our finely woven, stretch gabardine. Style features detailed yoke with a 3/8" genuine leather belt that sits at your natural waist. Skirt has center back invisible zipper, with hook and eye closure. Falls 29" from natural waist. Self: 62% Polyamide, 32% Viscose, 6% Elastane. Lining: 95% Polyester, 5% Elastane. Dry Clean Only. Made in USA of Imported Materials.

  • 29 inches From Natural Waist
  • Genuine Leather Belt
  • Center Back Hidden Zipper
  • Fully Lined
  • Tailored Pencil Skirt
  • High Waist
  • 204017
